name: Ludo Chaos
description:
"Ludo Chaos" is a Ludo-Style game. And due to that you might think this is a normal Ludo Game, but you might be decieved. Ludo Chaos is a game where the rules can be broken at any time... And with that, anything can happen... Even the game developer doesn't have control of the game anymore... Good luck!

This game was developed for the 2020 GMTK Game Jam with the theme "Out of control".
